description.en:
500 Favorit Iveco 155 engine by Cheva
v1.7R1: - Adapted for FS19 v1.7
v1.0.1R: - New engine - Iveco 150 Turbo (175HP, real model data used) - Working ligfts powered - 3 times stronger. - Added rims and body colors.
Fendt 500 Favorit Price: 76.000$ Power: 115hp
Configurations: - beacon lights - carpet - numberplate - front PTO - and many others
Engine configuration:
- Fendt Favorit 511 - Fendt Favorit 512 - Fendt Favorit 514 - Fendt Favorit 515
Animation: - This tractor is prepared with Mouse Control to open the doors, front window, back window and roof window.
This tractor is prepared for precision farming with configurable cropsensors.
Changelog 1.0.1.0: - added SimpleIC via Configuration - fixed several visual bugs - fixed small technical issues - added cropsensors for precision farming
description.ru:
500 Favorit Iveco 155 заказной от Чевы
v1.7R1: - Adapted for FS19 v1.7
v1.0.1R: - Новый двигатель - Iveco 150 Turbo (150 лошадей, брал из реальных данных) - Усилил свет в 3 раза, до 100 метров. - Добавил раскраску дисков и кузова.
Fendt 500 Favorit Price: 76.000$ Power: 115hp
Configurations: - beacon lights - carpet - numberplate - front PTO - and many others
Engine configuration:
- Fendt Favorit 511 - Fendt Favorit 512 - Fendt Favorit 514 - Fendt Favorit 515
Animation: - This tractor is prepared with Mouse Control to open the doors, front window, back window and roof window.
This tractor is prepared for precision farming with configurable cropsensors.
